caseTitle: The State through its Chairman NAB v. Hanif Hyder and others
tagline: The provision of section 25(a) of the National Accountability Ordinance, 1999 (?NAO?), which authorizes the Chairman National Accountability Bureau (?NAB?) to accept the offer of 'Voluntary Return' from a person of the amount illegally earned by him, prima facie is in conflict with the provisions of the Constitution. The office is directed to place the order before the honourable Chief Justice of Pakistan, for passing appropriate orders to treat the matter as a suo motu petition, and lay down the principles regarding cognizance by NAB in corruption matters under section 9 of NAO.
